text: Yadi allaha lokaderake tadera an'yaya kajera karane pakara'o karatena, tabe bhuprsthe calamana kona kichuke'i charatena na. Kintu tini pratisruti samaya paryanta taderake abakasa dena. Atahpara nirdharita samaye yakhana tadera mrtyu ese yabe, takhana eka muhurta'o bilambita kimba tarambita karate parabe na.
